About

I am a Web Developer and Designer focused on building great web applications.

I enjoy creating exquisitely designed, functional websites for my clients.



My name is Dandan Drori, and i'm just a regular guy.

I stumbled across the world of coding when I was about 19 years old,

when a friend of mine mention the acronym 'SQL' in a conversation.

A few moments later I went on a web quest to find what SQL is.

I looked up an online course for SQL and followed along the tutorials every single day until I completed it.

From that moment on I knew that this is what I wanted to do for the rest of my life.


I completed multiple online courses including Python, HTML, CSS and Javascript.

I've worked on dozens of personal projects, from simple projects like a Todos application to large scale, fully functional and carefully designed websites.

My mission is to keep doing what I love which is building websites and applications while helping others achieve their dreams by helping them get their dream website so their business can thrive.


So how does it work?

You contact me, we set a meeting (an online meeting works too), we discuss how to make your dreams a reality, and then we set goals and plan how to achieve them.

Don't worry, we will still keep close contact throughout the process, and changes will not be made before a mutual agreement is achieved.
